SEARCH
Package dao

Class LoanDao

java.lang.Object
dao.LoanDao
public class LoanDao extends Object
User Data Access Object (DAO) to manage database operations related to loans.

    • returnLoan

      public boolean returnLoan(int userId, String isbn)
      Method to return a loan by updating the returned status.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user.
      isbn - the ISBN of the book.
      Returns:
      true if the loan was successfully returned, false otherwise.
